sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable prettier/prettier */
import { View, Text, StyleSheet, TextInput, TouchableHighlight, Image } from 'react-native'
import React from 'react'


const colors = {
    theme_color : '#0AC5AD',
    theme_color_light1 : '#e6fff9',
    theme_color_light2 : '#99ffe7'
}

export default function Register() {
  return (
    <View style={styles.container}>
      <Image style={styles.LogoImg} source={require('../res/logo.png')}/>  
      <View style = {styles.bottomView}>
          <Text style = {styles.RegisterText}>Register</Text>
          <View style={{width: '100%',alignItems: 'center'}}>
            <TextInput 
                style = {styles.InputUser}
                placeholder='Name'/>
            <TextInput 
                style = {styles.InputUser}
                placeholder='Admission Number (eg: 19B007)'/>
            <TextInput 
                style = {styles.InputUser}
                placeholder='Password'
                secureTextEntry={true}/>
            <TextInput 
                style = {styles.InputUser}
                placeholder='Confirm Password'
                secureTextEntry={true}/>                                    
          </View>
          <View style={{flexDirection: 'row'}}>
            <TouchableHighlight style={styles.InputBtn}>
                <Text>Upload Photo</Text>
            </TouchableHighlight>
            <TouchableHighlight style={styles.InputBtn}>
                <Text>Upload ID Card</Text>
            </TouchableHighlight>            
          </View>
          <TouchableHighlight style={styles.LoginBtn}>
              <Text style={{fontWeight:'500'}}>Register</Text>
          </TouchableHighlight>

      </View>
    </View>
  )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        flex: 1,
        alignItems: 'center',
        backgroundColor: colors.theme_color
    },
    bottomView: {
        width: "100%",
        height: 500,
        backgroundColor: 'white',
        position: 'absolute',
        bottom: 0,
        left: 0,
        right: 0,
        padding: 20,
        borderTopLeftRadius: 30,
        borderTopRightRadius: 30,
        justifyContent: 'center',
        alignItems: 'center'
    },
    LogoImg: {
        width: 200,
        height: 70,
        backgroundColor: 'white',
        position:'relative',
        top: 80
    },
    InputUser: {
        width: '100%',
        height: 45,
        backgroundColor: colors.theme_color_light1,
        borderRadius: 8,
        padding: 10,
        borderWidth: 1,
        borderColor: colors.theme_color_light2,
        marginVertical: 10
    },
    LoginBtn: {
        paddingHorizontal: 45,
        paddingVertical: 10,
        marginTop: 20,
        marginBottom: 10,
        borderRadius: 50,
        backgroundColor: 'yellow',
    },
    RegisterText: {
        color: 'black',
        fontWeight:'500',
        fontSize:25,
        marginVertical:10
    },
    fpText: {
        color: 'black',
        alignSelf: 'flex-end',
        marginHorizontal: 10
    },
    RegText: {
        color: colors.theme_color,
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        marginLeft: 5
    },
    InputBtn: {
        backgroundColor: colors.theme_color_light2,
        padding: 10,
        borderRadius: 5,
        margin: 10
    }
})
